General.Name: Ningbo Kbe Electrical Technology Co
General.Description: Ningbo KBE Electrical Technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of automotive wire and cable products in China and internationally. It also offers German, Japanese, American, ISO, and Chinese standard products; and EV, data, and aluminum cables. The company serves automotive harness customers. Ningbo KBE Electrical Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Ninghai, China. The company is a subsidiary of Ningbo Xinxie Industrial Group Co., Ltd.
